name: Tactical Monsters Rumble Arena
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: ATI HD2600 512MB DirectX: Version 7.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT240 1GB Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1024 MB available space
